letters.description: Conduct a comprehensive assessment to identify the individual's unique strengths, challenges, and support requirements within their neurodiversity.
Establish a strong therapeutic alliance built on empathy, respect, and understanding to foster a safe and supportive coaching environment.
Work in partnership with the individual to define meaningful and achievable goals that align with their values, aspirations, and lived experience.
Equip the individual with practical strategies, tools, and resources to navigate challenges, leverage strengths, and enhance self-advocacy skills.
Encourage and celebrate successes, providing consistent positive feedback to build confidence and motivation throughout the coaching journey.
Continuously monitor progress, adjust strategies as needed, and provide ongoing support to ensure sustained growth and well-being.
